author: max
name: Earthquake
install_msg:
Thanks for installing.
# ⚠️WARNING⚠️
This cog provides informational alerts only and may have 15–30 minute delays. Always prioritize local authorities for real-time safety information.
Default minimum magnitude is 4.5, alerts will report earthquakes above this threshold. You can change this by using `[p]earthquakeset magnitude`.
If you enjoy my work, you can donate at [buymeacoffee](<https://buymeacoffee.com/ltzmax>)
description: Posts live worldwide earthquake updates from USGS to a designated channel.
short: Posts live worldwide earthquake updates from USGS to a designated channel.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any End User Data.
